thread.section_title: Excelsior Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3 night stay
thread.title_full: 3 night stay - Review of Excelsior Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sue C
title: 3 night stay
text: City break prior to a Caribbean cruise, The hotel is a little dated, but comfortable and spacious. Did find the staff a little stand offish. Good central location, Amsterdam Avenue, a few minutes walk, offers excellent choice or eateries. Brilliant weekend brunch though, at hotel's own "Calle Ocho" , just take care with limitless, complimentary sangria!
